roleset.name: impelling by a sense of shame, assigning shame as punishment

example.name: with MNR
example.text: I 'm not a legal expert , but I think failure to report is something that you can only get fined for , kind of a public shaming .

example.name: all args
example.text: ... and the second troop was Mormon-sponsored (and also led by my dad) out of what I interpreted as his shaming them into it.

example.name: with CAU
example.text: Jesus's shaming them publicly for their hypocrisy angered the Pharisees.
example.note: Here, Jesus is assigning shame, not acting shamefully himself. This is a major difference between shame.01 and shame.02.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, shame-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls force-59-1, judgement-33.

roleset.name: bring shame to another by acting shamefully oneself

role.descr: shameful actor/actions, bringing shame to arg1
entity experiencing feelings of shame for arg0

example.name: all args
example.text: John's shaming his family with his poor performance at the Olympics bought him a trip home alone.
example.arg: with his poor performance at the Olympics
example.note: Here, John isn't assigning shame, he is bringing shame by acting shamefully.
